attributes.action: Make it law that anybody found carrying/using a knife is to do National Service.
attributes.additional_details:
Our British Forces is seriously lacking. If we entered a world war now we wouldn’t survive. Give boys/girls and men/women, who use weapons on our streets, real weapons to use professionally with a minimum of three years service. Get them to learn new skills, build their confidence and self asteem. Give them a reason to live! Take them off our streets, out of prison and into our armed services which WE will all hugely benefit from. 

Let’s make Britain great again!
attributes.background: It is evident we have a war on our streets. Every day somebody is dying from being stabbed. Our youth have lost confidence in our country and taking the law into their own hands. If they want to play with weapons then give them the real thing. Our soft prison system is not the answer.

rejection.details:
National Service ended in the UK in 1963, so we're not sure exactly what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/239230
